original_title: David Bowie: Inside Bowie and the Spiders: 1972-1974
overview: Ziggy plays guitar in this critical review of artist David Bowie's career from 1972-74. The collection delves into the Master of Reinvention's creative process for his groundbreaking albums "Ziggy Stardust," "Aladdin Sane," "Pin Ups" and "Diamond Dogs," and features footage of Bowie's extravagantly theatrical stage performances, rare behind-the-scenes footage and interviews with surviving Spiders Trevor Bolder and Woody Woodmansey.
title: David Bowie: Inside Bowie and the Spiders: 1972-1974
